long_description: The Joby Grip Tight Micro stand turns your phone into a mini entertainment system wherever you go. Watch video, chat or surf the web sitting back in your chair instead of hunched over your screen. Small enough to fit in your pocket, this sleek stand is just as portable as your phone; adjustable rubber grip with steel springs fits almost any phone, with or without a case. Machined aluminum mini ball head lets you tilt your phone up to 36deg in any direction for the perfect viewing angle. The Joby Grip Tight Micro stand quickly folds and unfolds for easy deployment and storage.
short_description: The Joby Grip Tight Micro stand turns your phone into a mini entertainment system wherever you go. Watch video, chat or surf the web sitting back in your chair instead of hunched over your screen.
